fields.name: Capri MkI 1600 GT
fields.description: This Ford Capri MK1 was built in the year 1974. This two-door sports car is a 1600 GT version with a powerful 1600cc four-cylinder engine and manual gearbox. A fantastic car, both to see and to drive! The yellow paintwork of this Capri is in beautiful condition, as well as the characteristic black vinyl roof which gives the car a real classic look. The interior has light brown upholstery. Everything shows that this car comes from a true enthusiast. This Ford Capri is equipped with double round headlights of a Capri RS. The original headlights are present with the car and we can mount them for you if desired. Are you looking for a Ford Capri MK1 to drive beautiful trips? You are very welcome in our showroom to view this classic.
